CustomBehavior.Text:
Need human interaction for next quest, Mob dont avoid Beams

 TIP: move to back side, you must go down the ramps to go underneath the beam
 click NPC Han Storumstout, then come back and turn-in the quest.

Need human interaction for next quests, No mesh here
 TIP1: Goto 50,78 Use Dog's WhistleBag of Clams in your bags on Coldwhisker Otters
 TIP2: With Dog move to (underwater) 46,74 and 44,78 and 40,79
 TIP3: At ship click Soggy's Footlocker
 TIP4: With Dog kill 10 Rockshell Snapclaw
 TIP5: Kill sharks and use Thresher Jaw till have 200 itens
 .

Congratulations, you have reached Level 90!

 Hope you enjoyed all this profiles.
 If you did let me know, just drop an gratfully post at forum
 Or even better buy me a Burger.
